attributes.action: Replace Vehicle Road Tax with an additional charge on fuel to cover this and to make all road vehicles have as a minimum 3rd party vehicle insurance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
1) Levy to be added to a litre of fuel, based on the average mileage UK drivers undertake to provide the revenue – the more you drive the more you pay, therefore a fair approach and an improvement on the proposed extortionate congestion charges. Estimate 4 pence a litre.
2) Monies to replace Road Tax in full, in addition provide a basic 3rd party vehicle Insurance. If it drives, it pays and you are covered if it damages you/your property.
3) Foreign drivers entering the UK would pay a levy to cover the fact they refuel on the continent then drive on our roads  – providing a level playing field for commerce.
4) More of the actual money to be spent on Roads. In addition money should also be spent on improving Public transport, the only 100% sure way of fighting congestion, Tax breaks to Transport Companies that show marked improvements/efficiencies – including subsides for Transport fares.
